p: In their review article Kozlowska et al. summarize the herbal medicines used in the Beskid mountain ranges, which are located south of Krakow and Lviv, two important medieval centers of apothecary tradition in the area. In another interesting review Kunnumakkara et al. summarize potential benefits, traditional uses, chemistry, biological activities, and clinical trials of “guggul” from Commiphora and Boswellia.
